title: Cloud-Native Geospatial Sessions @ LPS 2025
text:
The following is a list of events at the
    2025 ESA Living Planet Symposium
    that involve cloud-native geospatial technologies.
    
    
    Of course, we may have missed some events while compiling this list.
    If you know of other events, please fill out an
    issue
    and/or submit a
    PR.
    
  





    
      
        Sunday 22 June
        15:30 - 16:50
        (Hall L3)
      
      
        
          Cloud-Native Earth Observation Processing with SNAP and Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem CDSE
          
          D.03.17  TUTORIAL #cloud-native
        
        
      

    
  



    
      
        Sunday 22 June
        15:30 - 16:50
        (Room 1.31/1.32)
      
      
        
          Mastering EOTDL: A Tutorial on crafting Training Datasets and developing Machine Learning Models
          
          D.02.18 TUTORIAL #stac
        
        
      

    
  



    
      
        Sunday 22 June
        17:00 - 18:20
        (Room 0.11/0.12)
      
      
        
          FAIR and Open Science with EarthCODE Integrated Platforms
          
          D.03.15 TUTORIAL #pangeo
        
        
      

    
  



    
      
        Sunday 22 June
        17:00 - 18:20
        (Room 1.34)
      
      
        
          JupyterGIS: Collaborative Geospatial Analysis in Jupyter
          
          D.04.11 HANDS-ON TRAINING #jupytergis
        
        
      

    
  



    
      
        Sunday 22 June
        17:00 - 18:20
        (Hall L3)

        17:00 - 18:20
        (Room 0.49/0.50)

        Monday 23 June

          Cloud-native Geospatial Community Social
          
            
        
        Register to attend here üëâüèæ

    Have fun at LPS!!!
